page.title: 12OUR PETS
page.content:
We asked the children if they had any pets and what they were.The most popul ar pets were {dogs,cats and goldfish. The figures for these were 47% of the children had a dog in their house.Next came goldfish which were in 24% of the houses and then came cats which were found in 23% of the houses.Only 4% of the children we asked had no pets at all.One person in our survey had as many as six pets these were: rabbit, goldfish,dog cat,guinnea pig and a budgerigar.I have just got a dog,she is a poodle called Trixy.
,
